20110115060145.000|20110115060148.000|CC1|WEEK WAS WERE THERE WARNING

20110115060209.000|20110115060211.000|CC1|US KNOW?                        
20110115060211.000|20110115060212.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BEHIND THE SMILES, 
20110115060212.000|20110115060213.000|CC1|THERE WERE SECRETS BUT THERE    
20110115060213.000|20110115060214.000|CC1|WERE ALSO SIGNS.

20110115060219.000|20110115060220.000|CC1|SHOOTING SPREE DESCRIBED THEIR

20110115060223.000|20110115060225.000|CC1|HE USED TO SCARE ME SOMETIMES.  
20110115060225.000|20110115060228.000|CC1|>> I TOLD MY MOM HE'S PROBABLY A
20110115060228.000|20110115060232.000|CC1|SERIAL KILLER.

20110115060237.000|20110115060239.000|CC1|>> ARE YOU SURPRISED THERE WERE 
20110115060239.000|20110115060240.000|CC1|WARNING SIGNS AND NOTHING WAS   
20110115060240.000|20110115060241.000|CC1|DONE?                           
20110115060241.000|20110115060242.000|CC1|>> PEOPLE OFTEN DON'T REALIZE   
20110115060242.000|20110115060244.000|CC1|WHAT THEY'RE SEEING IS A SYMPTOM
20110115060244.000|20110115060247.000|CC1|AS OPPOSED TO ADOLESCENCE,      
20110115060247.000|20110115060249.000|CC1|PARTICULARLY IN YOUNG MEN.      
20110115060249.000|20110115060251.000|CC1|THERE ARE IN RETROSPECT, OFTEN  
20110115060251.000|20110115060253.000|CC1|MANY WARNING SIGNS, BUT THOSE   
20110115060253.000|20110115060255.000|CC1|SAME SIGNS CAN BE SEEN IN MANY, 
20110115060255.000|20110115060257.000|CC1|MANY PEOPLE WHO NEVER GO ON TO

20110115060302.000|20110115060304.000|CC1|BE FOUND IN A KILLER'S OWN

20110115060313.000|20110115060315.000|CC1|>> SIX SHOTS AND THAT WAS IT.   
20110115060315.000|20110115060317.000|CC1|>> MARK DAVID CHAPMAN WAITED 12 
20110115060317.000|20110115060319.000|CC1|YEARS TO EXPLAIN HIMSELF IN ONE 
20110115060319.000|20110115060324.000|CC1|FACE TO FACE INTERVIEW IN ATTICA
20110115060324.000|20110115060325.000|CC1|PRISON.                         
20110115060325.000|20110115060327.000|CC1|>> WHY DID YOU KILL JOHN LENNON?
20110115060327.000|20110115060328.000|CC1|>> I THOUGHT BY KILLING HIM I   
20110115060328.000|20110115060330.000|CC1|WOULD ACQUIRE HIS FAME.         
20110115060330.000|20110115060332.000|CC1|>> Reporter: CHAPMAN LEFT CLUES 
20110115060332.000|20110115060333.000|CC1|THAT WOULD ONLY BE INTERPRETED  
20110115060333.000|20110115060334.000|CC1|IN HINDSIGHT.                   
20110115060334.000|20110115060336.000|CC1|FOR EXAMPLE, WHEN CHAPMAN       
20110115060336.000|20110115060339.000|CC1|CHECKED OUT OF HIS LAST JOB, HE 
20110115060339.000|20110115060344.000|CC1|SIGNED HIS NAME AS JOHN LENNON  
20110115060344.000|20110115060346.000|CC1|AND BECAME INCREASINGLY         
20110115060346.000|20110115060346.000|CC1|DELUSIONAL.                     
20110115060346.000|20110115060348.000|CC1|>> I ASKED SATAN TO GIVE ME THE 
20110115060348.000|20110115060350.000|CC1|POWER TO KILL JOHN LENNON.      
20110115060350.000|20110115060351.000|CC1|I HEARD THIS VOICE, NOT AN      
20110115060351.000|20110115060354.000|CC1|AUDIBLE VOICE, BUT AN INAUDIBLE 
20110115060354.000|20110115060356.000|CC1|VOICE SAYING OVER AND OVER, DO  
20110115060356.000|20110115060359.000|CC1|IT, DO IT, DO IT.               
20110115060359.000|20110115060402.000|CC1|I GUESS THAT WAS ME INSIDE.     
20110115060402.000|20110115060406.000|CC1|AND I FIRED AT HIS BACK FIVE    
20110115060408.000|20110115060408.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:04:00 of 1:00:00
20110115060406.000|20110115060409.000|CC1|STEADY SHOTS.                   
20110115060409.000|20110115060412.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND HE TALKED TO ME
20110115060412.000|20110115060416.000|CC1|ABOUT THE NEED HE HAD TO KILL   
20110115060416.000|20110115060417.000|CC1|JOHN LENNON, BUT OTHER PEOPLE   
20110115060417.000|20110115060419.000|CC1|DIDN'T KNOW THAT HE WAS HAVING  
20110115060419.000|20110115060423.000|CC1|THESE VERY STRONG IMPULSES OR   
20110115060423.000|20110115060423.000|CC1|IMAGES.                         
20110115060423.000|20110115060424.000|CC1|WHAT COULD HAVE BEEN DONE?      
20110115060424.000|20110115060426.000|CC1|>> THIS IS A PROBLEM, BECAUSE   
20110115060426.000|20110115060428.000|CC1|PEOPLE WITH MENTAL ILLNESS WHO  
20110115060428.000|20110115060431.000|CC1|HAVE EVEN A TINY BIT OF INSIGHT 
20110115060431.000|20110115060432.000|CC1|THAT THE THOUGHTS THEY WERE     
20110115060432.000|20110115060433.000|CC1|HAVING WOULD NOT BE OKAY WITH   
20110115060433.000|20110115060435.000|CC1|OTHER PEOPLE DON'T REVEAL THEM. 
20110115060435.000|20110115060437.000|CC1|IN THAT CASE, IT'S VERY HARD FOR
20110115060437.000|20110115060439.000|CC1|ANYBODY TO DO ANYTHING.         
20110115060439.000|20110115060440.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT THAT WAS NOT   
20110115060440.000|20110115060441.000|CC1|THE CASE WITH JARED LOUGHNER.   
20110115060441.000|20110115060443.000|CC1|THERE WERE SIGNS, BUT HIS       
20110115060443.000|20110115060444.000|CC1|PARENTS MISSED THEM.            
20110115060444.000|20110115060446.000|CC1|IN A WRITTEN STATEMENT, JARED   
20110115060446.000|20110115060448.000|CC1|LOUGHNER'S PARENTS SAID "WE     
20110115060448.000|20110115060451.000|CC1|DON'T UNDERSTAND WHY THIS       
20110115060451.000|20110115060451.000|CC1|HAPPENED."                      
20110115060451.000|20110115060452.000|CC1|THAT THOUGHT WAS SHARED BY THE  
20110115060452.000|20110115060455.000|CC1|MOTHER AND FATHER OF ANOTHER    
20110115060455.000|20110115060459.000|CC1|NOTORIOUS SHOOTER.              
20110115060459.000|20110115060502.000|CC1|MARCH 30, 1981, A GUNMAN SHOT   
20110115060502.000|20110115060504.000|CC1|PRESIDENT REAGAN, HIS PRESS     
20110115060504.000|20110115060506.000|CC1|AGENT, BRADY AND TWO OTHERS.    
20110115060506.000|20110115060510.000|CC1|HIS WOULD BE ASSASSIN, JOHN     
20110115060510.000|20110115060512.000|CC1|HINKLY, JR. WAS 25 YEARS OLD,   
20110115060512.000|20110115060513.000|CC1|THE YOUNGEST SON IN WHAT SEEMED 
20110115060514.000|20110115060514.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:05:00 of 1:00:00
20110115060513.000|20110115060516.000|CC1|A PICTURE PERFECT ALL AMERICAN  
20110115060516.000|20110115060517.000|CC1|FAMILY, LOVING.                 
20110115060517.000|20110115060519.000|CC1|HE DROPPED OUT OF COLLEGE, WAS  
20110115060519.000|20110115060521.000|CC1|DEEPLY DEPRESSED AND STARTED    
20110115060521.000|20110115060522.000|CC1|COLLECTING GUNS.                
20110115060522.000|20110115060525.000|CC1|>> YOU BOTH FEEL THERE ARE      
20110115060525.000|20110115060526.000|CC1|CERTAIN WARNING SIGNALS YOU HAVE
20110115060526.000|20110115060529.000|CC1|NOW LEARNED.                    
20110115060529.000|20110115060530.000|CC1|WHAT?                           
20110115060530.000|20110115060532.000|CC1|>> WITHDRAWAL INTO ONESELF AND  
20110115060532.000|20110115060533.000|CC1|AWAY FROM OTHER PEOPLE, TO      
20110115060533.000|20110115060536.000|CC1|BECOME A LONER, AND SECONDLY    
20110115060536.000|20110115060538.000|CC1|WHAT THEY CALL DISORDERED       
20110115060538.000|20110115060539.000|CC1|THINKING.                       
20110115060539.000|20110115060540.000|CC1|>> IRRATIONAL THOUGHTS.         
20110115060540.000|20110115060548.000|CC1|>> THE HINKLEYS FOLLOWED THEIR  
20110115060548.000|20110115060550.000|CC1|PSYCHIATRIST'S ADVICE AND THREW 
20110115060550.000|20110115060551.000|CC1|JOHN OUT OF THE HOUSE.          
20110115060551.000|20110115060553.000|CC1|>> THAT WAS THE LAST I SAW JOHN 
20110115060553.000|20110115060554.000|CC1|MILLION AFTER THE SHOOTING.     
20110115060554.000|20110115060556.000|CC1|>> AT THE TRIAL, YOU BURST INTO 
20110115060556.000|20110115060556.000|CC1|TEARS.                          
20110115060556.000|20110115060558.000|CC1|DO YOU THINK IT'S YOUR FAULT?   
20110115060558.000|20110115060559.000|CC1|>> THIS IS THE WORST MISTAKE OF 
20110115060559.000|20110115060600.000|CC1|MY LIFE.                        
20110115060600.000|20110115060601.000|CC1|I DIDN'T UNDERSTAND WHAT WAS    
20110115060601.000|20110115060602.000|CC1|WRONG WITH HIM.

20110115060612.000|20110115060614.000|CC1|WHEN HE WAS TOTALLY UNABLE TO   
20110115060614.000|20110115060614.000|CC1|COPE.                           
20110115060614.000|20110115060616.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THESE WERE VERY    
20110115060617.000|20110115060617.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:06:00 of 1:00:00
20110115060616.000|20110115060618.000|CC1|NICE, PRODUCTIVE, NORMAL PARENTS
20110115060618.000|20110115060621.000|CC1|WHO LOVED THEIR SON.            
20110115060621.000|20110115060622.000|CC1|SHOULD HE HAVE KNOWN?           
20110115060622.000|20110115060624.000|CC1|WHAT SHOULD HE HAVE DONE?       
20110115060624.000|20110115060626.000|CC1|>> UNFORTUNATELY, THEY DIDN'T   
20110115060626.000|20110115060628.000|CC1|KNOW, AS THEY SAID, MUCH AT ALL 
20110115060628.000|20110115060629.000|CC1|ABOUT MENTAL ILLNESS.           
20110115060629.000|20110115060631.000|CC1|IT WASN'T IN THE MAINSTREAM.    
20110115060631.000|20110115060633.000|CC1|WE DIDN'T TALK ABOUT IT.        
20110115060633.000|20110115060634.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN THIS CASE, THE  
20110115060634.000|20110115060635.000|CC1|PARENTS DID KNOW.               
20110115060635.000|20110115060638.000|CC1|THEIR 15-YEAR-OLD SON, SAM, WAS 
20110115060638.000|20110115060639.000|CC1|SERIOUSLY DISTURBED.            
20110115060639.000|20110115060642.000|CC1|HE HAD SHOWN BIZARRE BEHAVIOR,  
20110115060642.000|20110115060645.000|CC1|EVEN TORTURING THE FAMILY'S CATS
20110115060645.000|20110115060646.000|CC1|AND DOGS.                       
20110115060646.000|20110115060648.000|CC1|WHEN SAM'S PARENTS SOUGHT HELP, 
20110115060648.000|20110115060650.000|CC1|THEY WERE REBUFFED AT EVERY     
20110115060650.000|20110115060651.000|CC1|TURN.                           
20110115060651.000|20110115060653.000|CC1|FIRST, BY A COMMUNITY CRISIS    
20110115060653.000|20110115060654.000|CC1|CENTER.                         
20110115060654.000|20110115060655.000|CC1|>> THEY SAID THAT I WAS PROBABLY
20110115060655.000|20110115060657.000|CC1|THE ONE THAT NEEDED THE HELP AND
20110115060657.000|20110115060658.000|CC1|NOT HIM.                        
20110115060658.000|20110115060659.000|CC1|>> Reporter: NEXT THEY TURNED TO
20110115060659.000|20110115060701.000|CC1|A FAMILY COURT JUDGE WITH NO    
20110115060701.000|20110115060702.000|CC1|SUCCESS.                        
20110115060702.000|20110115060705.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE NOT A PSYCHOPATH, NO, 
20110115060705.000|20110115060707.000|CC1|SO YOU HAVE SOME ADJUSTMENT     
20110115060707.000|20110115060707.000|CC1|PROBLEMS.                       
20110115060707.000|20110115060709.000|CC1|I'M GOING TO MAKE YOUR PARENTS  
20110115060709.000|20110115060711.000|CC1|TAKE YOU HOME.                  
20110115060711.000|20110115060712.000|CC1|TODAY.                          
20110115060712.000|20110115060713.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FOUR DAYS LATER,   
20110115060713.000|20110115060715.000|CC1|SAM WAS HOME ALONE WHEN HIS     
20110115060715.000|20110115060717.000|CC1|11-YEAR-OLD NEIGHBOR RANG THE   
20110115060717.000|20110115060720.000|CC1|DOORBELL TO SELL CANDY FOR THE  
20110115060720.000|20110115060720.000|CC1|PTA.                            
20110115060720.000|20110115060720.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:07:00 of 1:00:00
20110115060720.000|20110115060722.000|CC1|SAM INVITED THE BOY INSIDE.     
20110115060722.000|20110115060725.000|CC1|>> THE BODY OF A YOUNG CAUCASIAN
20110115060725.000|20110115060725.000|CC1|MALE.                           
20110115060725.000|20110115060728.000|CC1|>> Reporter: TORTURED AND       
20110115060728.000|20110115060728.000|CC1|STRANGLED HIM.                  
20110115060728.000|20110115060730.000|CC1|HIS BODY WAS DISCOVERED IN THE  
20110115060730.000|20110115060731.000|CC1|NEARBY WOODS.

20110115062313.000|20110115062314.000|CC1|THAT KATE DECIDED TO SLEEP ON

20110115065340.000|20110115065341.000|CC1|PEOPLE WILL JUMP ON THAT AND SAY
